name: Little_Scottie
text:
Little Scottie
"This is a sly dog with a big bite!"
The Little Scottie, or just Scottie, was a cocktail created by Twin Peaks, Washington's first mayor, John Hanford on the July 4, 1891 at an establishment later known as the Roadhouse. It was featured in Spirits magazine, the "Jerry Allen Show" and Backstop by Jared Back.
It was made of:
2 parts bourbon
1 part rye
A dash of Drambuie
A twist of lime
It was strained over cracked ice in a short glass and was usually accompanied by cheese and crackers.
